data.title: Eric Voegelin Today: Voegelin's Political Thought in the 21st Century (Political Theory for Today)
data.meta_description: The authors in this volume demonstrate that Voegelin's erudition on topics such as revolutionary change, ideological fervor, industrialization, globalism, and the place for reason and how it may be cultivated in complex time's remains as meaningful today as it was in the 1950s.
